where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_CONFER_HISTORY set UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CALCLATE_PERIOD = #{calclatePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_CHANNEL = #{financeChannel,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CONFER_TYPE = #{conferType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE = #{extendConferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRANT_FLAG = #{grantFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE = #{validDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FEATURE = #{feature,jdbcType=CHAR}, GRANT_DEPT = #{grantDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select cch.HISTORY_ID,cch.CONFER_CODE,cch.CONFER_ID,cch.DEPT_CODE, cch.CHANNEL_CODE,cch.SIGN_DATE,cch.VALID_DATE, cch.EXPIRE_DATE,cch.CALCLATE_PERIOD,cch.UPDATED_DATE, MEDIUM_CNAME,DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME, decode(APPROVE_FLAG, '0', '未审核', '1', '已审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(CONFER_TYPE, '1', '代理协议', '2', '经纪协议', '') CONFER_TYPE from CHANNEL_CONFER_HISTORY cch left join CHANNEL_MEDIUM_DETAIL_HISTORY pb on pb.HISTORY_ID = cch.HISTORY_ID left join DEPARTMENT dept on cch.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join salesman sa on cch.APPROVE_CODE = sa.salesman_code
order by cch.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select cch.HISTORY_ID,cch.CONFER_CODE,cch.CONFER_ID,cch.DEPT_CODE, cch.CHANNEL_CODE,cch.SIGN_DATE,cch.VALID_DATE,cch.RATE, cch.EXPIRE_DATE,cch.CALCLATE_PERIOD,cch.UPDATED_DATE, pb.CHANNEL_NAME,DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME, decode(APPROVE_FLAG, '0', '未审核', '1', '已审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(FINANCE_CHANNEL, '0', '否', '1', '是', '') FINANCE_CHANNEL, fe.CHANNEL_NAME FEATURE from CHANNEL_CONFER_HISTORY cch left join CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL_HISTORY pb on pb.HISTORY_ID = cch.HISTORY_ID left join DEPARTMENT dept on cch.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join CHANNEL_FEATURE fe on fe.CHANNEL_CODE = cch.FEATURE left join salesman sa on cch.APPROVE_CODE = sa.salesman_code
order by cch.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select cch.*, pb.CHANNEL_NAME,cch.DEPT_CODE || '-' || DEPT_SIMPLE_NAME DEPT_CNAME from CHANNEL_CONFER_HISTORY cch left join CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL_HISTORY pb on pb.HISTORY_ID = cch.HISTORY_ID left join DEPARTMENT dept on cch.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.insert: insert into channel_confer_history ( ) select #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE, CALCLATE_PERIOD, SIGN_DATE, SEQ_mission.Nextval, RATE, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE, FINANCE_CHANNEL, REMARK, DEPT_CODE, sysdate, CONFER_TYPE, CONFER_CODE, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE, GRANT_FLAG, VALID_IND, sysdate, #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE, FEATURE, GRANT_DEPT, CONFER_ID, APPROVE_FLAG, APPROVE_CODE from channel_confer cc where cc.CONFER_CODE = #{conferCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.valid_ind = '1'

insert into channel_confer_history ( ) select #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE, CALCLATE_PERIOD, SIGN_DATE, SEQ_mission.Nextval, RATE, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CODE, FINANCE_CHANNEL, REMARK, DEPT_CODE, sysdate, CONFER_TYPE, CONFER_CODE, EXTEND_CONFER_CODE, GRANT_FLAG, VALID_IND, sysdate, #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_DATE, FEATURE, GRANT_DEPT, CONFER_ID, APPROVE_FLAG, APPROVE_CODE from channel_confer cc where cc.channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cc.valid_ind = '1'
